title: "Be the one to rely on in a crisis"
description: Jordan Peterson says, life may be a tragedy - don't make it worse. Try to become the person who others can rely on in times of crisis. This is a highly personal story from David Fuller, the founder of Rebel Wisdom about the powerful emotional journey he went through to mend a very difficult relationship with his father - when his father was given a short time to live.
